Rules for Multiclassing in Baldur's Gate 3

Channel Divinity: Channel Divinity can be learned by multiple Classes, with each having different effects. Multiclassing to another class and learning their Channel Divinity, while already having one of your own, does not increase the number of Channel Divinity Charges the character has.
